REACT_APP_demonstration.textBefore: You can have a demonstration page with a single image.
REACT_APP_demonstration.textAfter: You can use this page to describe how the rest of the survey works.

REACT_APP_demonstration.textBefore: You can have a demonstration page with a single video player (custom size).
REACT_APP_demonstration.textAfter: You can use this page to run a video check, or to display a tutorial video showing how the rest of the survey works.

REACT_APP_demonstration.textBefore: You can have a demonstration page with a single audio player (custom size).
REACT_APP_demonstration.textAfter: You can use this page to run a sound check, or to play a tutorial audio describing how the rest of the survey works.
